events.comment: At the beginning define the variable to be used for scroll_speed

If the x position of the background is <= then the width of the image, set x position of the background to be the width of the image just next to the one currently on the screen and basically make the two constantly swap each other
Move the background on the x every frame by the value of scroll_speed

events.comment:
Using the Modulo Expression to Change the Position of Camera on Background layer.
In mod(x, y), x is the position of center of camera which in this case is my CameraX("",0) and CameraY("",0).
The y is the Position after which the Sprite starts looping again. In this case, the original size of the tiled sprite off screen.
